Uses of Package
org.mitre.mat.core

Classes in org.mitre.mat.core used by org.mitre.mat.core
Annotation
          The core object that corresponds to a span annotation.
AnnotationCore
          The core Annotation class for MAT.
AnnotationException
           
AnnotationIDCache
          Keeps track of the unique ID for each annotation, and tracks information about where annotations are referenced by other annotations.
AnnotationIDCache.AnnotationReference
          For any annotation that is referenced by another annotation, this class stores the referring annotation, the name of the annotation-valued attribute, and the aggregation type of the attribute.
AnnotationTypeRepository
           
AttributeType
          An Abstract class defining the common behavior of all Attribute Types.
AttributeValueCollection
          An abstract class for Collections of values (Sets or Lists) intended to be used as an attribute value filler.
AttributeValueList
          A (non-abstract) subclass of AttributeValueCollection for Lists intended to be used as an attribute value filler.
AttributeValueSet
          A (non-abstract) subclass of AttributeValueCollection for Sets intended to be used as an attribute value filler.
Atype
          A type of annotations, containing a label and a set of attributes for each annotation.
ComplexRestriction
          The class that defines complex restrictions on annotation-valued attributes.
DocumentAnnotationTypeRepository
          This is the document-level repository of annotation types.
GlobalAnnotationTypeRepository
          The class that represents the task-level repository of annotations types available.
MATDocument
          The object which embodies a MAT document.
MATDocumentEncoding
          The interface for each encoding object.
MATDocumentException
           
MATDocumentInterface
          An API for a MAT document, for use with the serializer and deserializer.
SpanlessAnnotation
          An Annotation that is not directly anchored to a span of text
